author: Morgan Sung
title: 10 things to fantasize about doing once coronavirus is over
description: Most people in the United States are on their third or fourth week of self-quarantine. Some states are calling it "shelter in place," and others are calling it "stay at home." Whatever the official name, life as we knew it has changed, indefinitely. With the …
content:
Most people in the United States are on their third or fourth week of self-quarantine. Some states are calling it "shelter in place," and others are calling it "stay at home." Whatever the official name, life as we knew it has changed, indefinitely.
